title: What is the most important type of recreation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Recreation is an activity of leisure, leisure being discretionary time. The "need to do something for recreation" is an essential element of human biology and psychology. Recreational activities are often done for enjoyment, amusement, or pleasure and are considered to be "fun". I’ve compiled a list of activities most popular among first-time users. Based on research by the Outdoor Foundation 1. Bird watching 2. Skiing 3. Snowboarding 4. Snorkeling 5. Sailing 5. Scuba Diving 6. Whitewater rafting 7. Kayaking 8. Backpacking (Overnight) Etc... Reference: List25 - Consistently Conciliating Curiosity
